title: STAT+: Should Medicare automatically pay for medical devices that the FDA deems ‘breakthrough’?
description: Questions about cost and patient benefit loom as Congress considers automatic Medicare coverage for 'breakthrough' medical devices.
content: Questions about cost and patient benefit loom as Congress considers automatic Medicare coverage for 'breakthrough' medical devices.
